definition: history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China

sentences.english: For selected items, there are videos featuring discussions by expert curators.
sentences.chinese: 對一些精選展品內容，還配有文史專家的討論視頻。

sentences.english: He is a member of culture and history research center of Chongqing City.
sentences.chinese: 現任重慶市文史研究館館員。

sentences.english: The history and geography have deeper understanding of Chinese literature and history.
sentences.chinese: 對歷史地理中國文史有較深瞭解。

sentences.english: Besides, there is a tradition that literature and history are not divided in ancient Chinese literature.
sentences.chinese: 另外，我國古代文學有文史不分的傳統。

sentences.english: Self-concept of arts students is lower than science students as well as normal students.
sentences.chinese: 文史類專業學生的自我概念低於理工科和師範類學生。

sentences.english: In short, Li Hua is both a litterateur and a historian.
sentences.chinese: 李華是一位文史兼通的大家。

sentences.english: The traditional cultural and historical research is based on the individual as the basic unit of self-sufficiency.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的文史研究基本是以個體爲單位，自己自足。

sentences.english: Wen Shiguan in Chengshan Scenic Area.
sentences.chinese: 文史館在成山頭風景區內。

sentences.english: The edition of literary and historical periodicals should observe three principles.
sentences.chinese: 文史類期刊編輯需要把握三點原則。

sentences.english: Literary history is finally gave Yang ink green book, excited Yang green ink.
sentences.chinese: 文史館終於要給楊墨青出書了，讓楊墨青興奮不已。

definition: narrative history/comprehensive history/a history covering an extended period
"Redology", academic field devoted to the study of A Dream of Red Mansions
